channel.title: Can You Help Please
channel.description:
How do i make a pk zone i got the pk box but i aint got the pk zone i have looked in the tut section but that say how to make a funkpk i tryed it but it didn't work i only want to the pk box so u can kill anyone at any lvl for e.g lvl 3 vs lvl 126 and when you go out of wildy your
i also really want to know this there is a teleport called teleport to ape atoll how do i change the text and how do i make it teleport? because it isn't in the text handler.java when i serached in it and i cant telport and were when i click it.
And how do i add a command were when you type it in u join a clan and get the clan armour?
I poasted this before but on th eother thread i didn't get much help -.-
